dsOverview.title: GFDL Global Analyses for FGGE, SOP 1 and 2, 1978Dec-1979Nov

summary.p: This dataset contains global analyses of tropospheric geopotential height, temperature, winds, relative humidity, and vertical motion from the Geophysical Fluid Dynamics Laboratory (GFDL) for FGGE Special Observation Periods 1 and 2.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/GFDL > NOAA Geophysical Fluid Dynamics Laboratory, U.S. Department of Commerce

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Altitude > Geopotential Height
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Air Temperature
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Upper Level Winds
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Water Vapor > Humidity
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Vertical Wind Motion
EARTH SCIENCE > Oceans > Ocean Winds > Wind Stress
dsOverview.supportsProject: GARP/FGGE > Global Atmospheric Research Program/First Garp Global Experiment (GARP/FGGE)

reference.authorList: Ploshay, J.J., R.K. White, and K. Miyakoda
reference.title: FGGE Level III-B Daily Global Analyses Part II (Mar 1979 - May 1979)
